title: Inquiry About Assignment 1 Grading Timeline
content: Good evening, Professor. I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to kindly inquire about when we can expect the grades for Assignment 1 to be posted. Thank you in advance for your response.

title: Request for Feedback on Project Phase 1
content: Dear Professor, I hope you're doing well. Could you please provide us with feedback on Phase 1 of the project? It would be really helpful as we move forward. Thank you!

title: Reflections on the Project Timeline
content: The project was an enjoyable and enriching experience for our team. However, we feel that having a bit more time to work on it would have allowed us to refine our work further. Thank you for considering this feedback.

title: Acknowledgment of Project Feedback
content: Thank you for your input regarding the project timeline. We will take this into account for future iterations to ensure a smoother experience.

title: Update on Project Feedback and Grades
content: Thank you for your patience. You will receive your grades and detailed feedback for Phase 1 during the lab session next week, inshallah. Please let me know if you have any further questions.

title: Assignment 1 Grades Update
content: Thank you for your inquiry. The grades for Assignment 1 will be posted this week, inshallah. Please stay tuned for further updates.

title: Concern About Overlapping Deadlines
content: Good day, Professor. I wanted to express my concern about the two homework assessments being due only one week apart. It feels a bit overwhelming, and I was wondering if it might be possible to get an extension for Homework 2. Thank you for considering this.

title: Response to Deadline Concern
content: Thank you for sharing your concern, Alya. I completely understand how challenging overlapping deadlines can be. I will reach out to the course coordinator to discuss the possibility of an extension for Homework 2 and will get back to you soon.
